faculties_accepted: Faculty of History and the Arts
Faculty of Philosophy, Philosophy of Science and Religious Studies
Faculty of Psychology and Educational Sciences
Faculty of Mathematics, Computer Science and Statistics
module_restrictions: Undergraduate students are not permitted to take master-level courses
Courses related to Business Administration, Medicine and Dentistry, Pharmacy, Veterinary Science, and special fee-paying programs offered by individual departments are not open to exchange students
visa_info: EU citizens and citizens from certain countries do not need a visa to enter Germany. All other students must apply for a visa for study purposes via the German diplomatic representation in their home country.
accommodations_info: The 'Studentenwerk' is responsible for providing accommodation for LMU exchange students. Housing may be limited due to a shortage in Munich.
Accommodation provided by the Studentenwerk München requires commitment to a stated duration of stay on contract.

cost_of_living.additional_info: Students must provide a statement of financial support proving that they have at least €735 to live on for each month of their stay.

university_description: Ludwig-Maximilians-University of Munich is a research university located in Munich, Germany. It is one of the oldest and highest-ranked universities in Germany.
location_cost_of_living: Munich is considered one of the most expensive cities in Germany, with high costs for rent, food, and entertainment.
